name: TrafficReportFlashBriefing-Atlanta
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This flash briefing plays a radio-style traffic report of the current traffic in the Atlanta area.

This traffic report updates every 15 minutes and gives you an audio overview of the current traffic in the Atlanta area. It's the perfect complement to your Flash Briefing line up as you're getting ready in the morning or on your way out the door later in the day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
